description.raw:
When converting an sdf 1.4 file to sdf 1.5, a `use_parent_model_frame` tag is added to any `<axis>` elements. As of sdf7, when converting from 1.4 to 1.6, it adds multiple `use_parent_model_frame` tags. This can be seen by observing the console output of the `INTEGRATION_joint_axis_frame` test:

from [sdf6](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat6-homebrew-amd64/17/console):

~~~
19: [ RUN      ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing
19: <axis>
19:   <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
19:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
19:   <limit>
19:     <lower>-1e+16</lower>
19:     <upper>1e+16</upper>
19:   </limit>
19: </axis>
19: [       OK ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing (76 ms)
~~~

from [sdf8](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat8-homebrew-amd64/37/consoleFull) (sdf7 doesn't have dedicated CI jobs):

~~~
27: [ RUN      ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing
27: <axis>
27:   <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
27:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
27:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
27:   <limit>
27:     <lower>-1e+16</lower>
27:     <upper>1e+16</upper>
27:   </limit>
27: </axis>
27: [       OK ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing (53 ms)
~~~

I've added a test to expect that only 1 tag is added, and fixed the problem in Converter.cc by ensuring that a new `TiXmlDocument` object is used for each conversion, as currently the convert documents are appended.
description.html:
When converting an sdf 1.4 file to sdf 1.5, a use_parent_model_frame tag is added to any <axis> elements. As of sdf7, when converting from 1.4 to 1.6, it adds multiple use_parent_model_frame tags. This can be seen by observing the console output of the INTEGRATION_joint_axis_frame test:

from sdf6:

19: [ RUN      ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing
19: <axis>
19:   <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
19:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
19:   <limit>
19:     <lower>-1e+16</lower>
19:     <upper>1e+16</upper>
19:   </limit>
19: </axis>
19: [       OK ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing (76 ms)

from sdf8 (sdf7 doesn't have dedicated CI jobs):

27: [ RUN      ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing
27: <axis>
27:   <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
27:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
27:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
27:   <limit>
27:     <lower>-1e+16</lower>
27:     <upper>1e+16</upper>
27:   </limit>
27: </axis>
27: [       OK ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing (53 ms)

I've added a test to expect that only 1 tag is added, and fixed the problem in Converter.cc by ensuring that a new TiXmlDocument object is used for each conversion, as currently the convert documents are appended.

title.raw: Prevent duplicate `use_parent_model_frame` tags during file conversion

description:
When converting an sdf 1.4 file to sdf 1.5, a `use_parent_model_frame` tag is added to any `<axis>` elements. As of sdf7, when converting from 1.4 to 1.6, it adds multiple `use_parent_model_frame` tags. This can be seen by observing the console output of the `INTEGRATION_joint_axis_frame` test:

from [sdf6](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat6-homebrew-amd64/17/console):

~~~
19: [ RUN      ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing
19: <axis>
19:   <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
19:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
19:   <limit>
19:     <lower>-1e+16</lower>
19:     <upper>1e+16</upper>
19:   </limit>
19: </axis>
19: [       OK ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing (76 ms)
~~~

from [sdf8](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat8-homebrew-amd64/37/consoleFull) (sdf7 doesn't have dedicated CI jobs):

~~~
27: [ RUN      ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing
27: <axis>
27:   <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
27:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
27:   <use_parent_model_frame>1</use_parent_model_frame>
27:   <limit>
27:     <lower>-1e+16</lower>
27:     <upper>1e+16</upper>
27:   </limit>
27: </axis>
27: [       OK ] JointAxisFrame.Version_1_4_missing (53 ms)
~~~

I've added a test to expect that only 1 tag is added, and fixed the problem in Converter.cc by ensuring that a new `TiXmlDocument` object is used for each conversion, as currently the convert documents are appended.
